text: Tonight at 8 p.m. ET, join us for a roundtable on the coronavirus crisis. I'll be joined by our campaign Health Policy Chair Rep. @PramilaJayapal and health professionals, featuring music by @SarahLeeGuthrie. Tune in at https://t.co/vreIiWfeoS. https://t.co/kWebnML16B
